inclusion.criterion: Male ≥ 18 years old with diagnosis of bulbar urethral stricture by voiding cystourethrogram
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Strictures must predominantly include the proximal and/or mid-bulbar urethra
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Male patients with bulbar urethral stricture > 1 cm in length
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of multiple urological procedures, but none that would likely trigger exclusion. He will need to be taken to the OR for surgical repair when stable.
